sections.heading: Bonds; irregularities; effect.No official bond shall be rendered void by reason of any informality or irregularity in its execution or approval
sections.text: SourceLaws 1881, c. 13, § 13, p. 97;R.S.1913, § 5719;C.S.1922, § 5049;C.S.1929, § 12-113;R.S.1943, § 11-113.AnnotationsBond of public officer, joint and sev
